steps.name: I am on the connexion page
I should see the email or phone number filed
I should see the password field
I should see connection button

elements.name: Connect to TruskX account using an existing account

steps.name: I enter a phone number associated to an account
I enter a password associated to an account
I click on connection
The connection is successful
I should see my first and last name at the top of the page
I am on the connexion page
I should see the email or phone number filed
I should see the password field
I should see connection button

elements.name: Connect to TruskX account using an existing account with invalid password

steps.name: I enter a phone number associated to an account
I enter an invalid password
I click on connection
I should see a popup indicating that the password associated with this account is invalid

name: Connection
description: This feature allow user to connect to his account using phone number or email

elements.name: Create a post using Truskx account

steps.name: I am connected to my Trusk space
I click on publish a post
I should see a text field is displayed allowing you to fill in the details of the post
I enter the content of the post
I click on publish post
I should see a popup indicating that the post has been published

name: Posts creation
description: This feature allow user to publish a post

steps.name: I am registered with my phone number
a Trusk member published a post
I should  receive an SMS notification with get the following message: Hello First name, you have a new post to read on TruskX. To view it, click on this link xxxxx/truskX.com.
I click on the link indicated on message
I should be directed to the Posts page

name: Posts notifications
description: This feature allow user to verify if she/he can receive notification by phone

steps.name: I am on the connexion page
I should see the email or phone number filed
I should see the password field
I should see connection button
I click on registration
The registration page should be open
I should see the email or phone number filed on registration page
I should see the password field on registration page
I should see the password confirmation field on registration page
I should see the register button
I should see GCU checkbox
I enter an invalid phone number
I enter a password that meets the requirements
I click on registration
I should see a popup indicating that the phone number is invalid
I am on the connexion page
I should see the email or phone number filed
I should see the password field
I should see connection button
I click on registration
The registration page should be open
I should see the email or phone number filed on registration page
I should see the password field on registration page
I should see the password confirmation field on registration page
I should see the register button
I should see GCU checkbox
I enter an existing phone number
I enter a password that does not meet the requirements
I click on registration
I should see a popup indicating that the password entered does not meet the requirements
I am on the connexion page
I should see the email or phone number filed
I should see the password field
I should see connection button
I click on registration
The registration page should be open
I should see the email or phone number filed on registration page
I should see the password field on registration page
I should see the password confirmation field on registration page
I should see the register button
I should see GCU checkbox

elements.name: Register with valid phone number and password

steps.name: I enter an existing phone number
I enter a password that meets the requirements
I click on registration
I should see a popup to confirm that registration is with success
I must be logged into my account

name: Regestration
description: This feature allow user to create an account on TruskX using his phone number or email
